resources.string: When this service is enabled it lets \' Dot safe app \' to display notifications and indicators every time a third-party app or a service uses camera or microphone on any screen. \n\nThis Service/App doesn\'t have any permission to use internet or your device\'s camera, microphone or any other Hardware. And will NOT gather any data whatsoever.
Get notified every time a third-party app uses camera or microphone
